Text:
In case you would be interested in the earlier collections of PapaPop you can check the back catalogue at http://thepiratebay.org/user/The%20Real%20Chicken/ .

Thanks to the almighty Chicken the history still exists :-)
As usual: Great work. Thank you.

Well, I always cherish each and everyone of your releases which always inspires me to listen to great bands I never heard of before. My download haven't started yet but judging from the song list this one issurely up there among the very best. Thank you for having such great taste in music and sharing it with us wannabe electroheads :)

RC: Thanks right back for your voluntary deed as the guardian of old P-pops. The lazy author appreciates that :-) 

Largex: I really donÂ´t know what to answer to such praise of my humble compilations...so I simply say thank you and promise to try and introduce new stuff in the future also.
